inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getUser.

instanceId.description: Reference to the hosting Amazon Connect Instance

name.description: Returns information on a specific User by name

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the User.

userId.description: Returns information on a specific User by User id

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getUser.

arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the User.

directoryUserId.description: The identifier of the user account in the directory used for identity management.

hierarchyGroupId.description: The identifier of the hierarchy group for the user.

id.description: The provider-assigned unique ID for this managed resource.

identityInfos.description: A block that contains information about the identity of the user. Documented below.

instanceId.description: Specifies the identifier of the hosting Amazon Connect Instance.

phoneConfigs.description: A block that contains information about the phone settings for the user. Documented below.

routingProfileId.description: The identifier of the routing profile for the user.

securityProfileIds.description: A list of identifiers for the security profiles for the user.

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the User.
